title: Eternia Crystal (NPC)
summaries: The Eternia Crystal NPC is a background object that is the centerpiece of the Old One's Army event.

Pressing âš’ Use / Attack on the Eternia Crystal Stand with an Eternia Crystal in the player's inventory will place the Eternia Crystal on the stand. A long, flat area is required in order to place the Eternia Crystal successfully and summon the event; otherwise, the Eternia Crystal will not be placed. After a 5-second countdown, the Eternia Crystal (now considered an NPC) must be protected from waves of enemies from the Old One's Army who will prioritize attacking it. If the Crystal is destroyed, the event ends in failure. If it is kept "alive" until all waves are cleared, the event is won.
The Eternia Crystal is purchased from the Tavernkeep for 25 (pre-any mechanical boss) / 1 (post-any mechanical boss) / 4 (post-Golem).
